description: This file contains code for generating JSON-RPC API headers, classes, enumerations, and stubs based on a provided schema. It manages the creation of C++ header and source files, includes logic for up-to-date checks, and calls various emitters for code generation.

methods.name: CreateApiHeader(log, source_name, path, headers)
methods.description: Generates a C++ header file defining the JSON-RPC API based on given headers, with include directives and header guards.

methods.name: Create(log, schema, source_file, path, additional_includes, generate_classes, generate_stubs, generate_rpc)
methods.description: Main function that orchestrates the code generation process, including parsing schemas, generating classes, enums, version info, stubs, and RPC implementations based on various flags and schema contents.

ctags.name: Create
ctags.pattern: /^def Create(log, schema, source_file, path, additional_includes, generate_classes, generate_stubs/
ctags.signature: (log, schema, source_file, path, additional_includes, generate_classes, generate_stubs, generate_rpc)
